attributes.action: Savings interest should be tax free for pensioners
attributes.additional_details:
The last 28 months of 0.5% base rate has decimated the incomes of all those who are reliant on savings income to supplement poor state pensions

The Government has done nothing to help pensioners and indeed has made the situation far worse

1) by changing from RPI to CPI for uprating pensions neither index reflects the true spending of Pensioners especially because their major costs of Council Tax and Housing are excluded

2) Reduction of winter fuel allowance

3) Interest rates are far below even CPI

Hence Pensioners desperately need help and by allowing all savings incopme to be tax free would be a fair way to treat those who have no other way to improve their situation and have certainly done nothing whatever to create the financial crisis
